org.waarp.common.crypto

Class HmacSha256

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.common.crypto.KeyObject
      • org.waarp.common.crypto.HmacSha256

  • public class HmacSha256
extends KeyObject
    This class handles methods to crypt (not decrypt) messages with HmacSha256 algorithm (very efficient: 105000/s).

    Usage:
    • Create a HmacSha256 object: HmacSha256 key = new HmacSha256();
    • Create a key:
      • Generate: key.generateKey();
        The method key.getSecretKeyInBytes() allow getting the key in Bytes.
      • From an external source: key.setSecretKey(arrayOfBytes);
    • To crypt a String in a Base64 format: String myStringCrypt = key.cryptToString(myString);
